Event.Name: DBEventLogStarted
Event.Description: Fired when an AGC database event log is started.
Event.Format: An AGC database event log was started for server %.ComputerName%.

Event.Name: DBEventLogStopped
Event.Description: Fired when an AGC database event log is stopped.
Event.Format: An AGC database event log was stopped for server %.ComputerName%.

Event.Name: NTEventLogStarted
Event.Description: Fired when an AGC NT Event Log is started.
Event.Format: An AGC NT Event Log was started for server %.ComputerName%.

Event.Name: NTEventLogStopped
Event.Description: Fired when an AGC NT Event log is stopped.
Event.Format: An AGC NT Event Log was stopped for server %.ComputerName%.

Event.Name: AGCNotInitialized
Event.Description: Fired when an AGC event is triggered prior to AGC being initialized.
Event.Format: An AGC Event was triggered prior to the initialization of the AGC module.

Event.Name: AGCAssert
Event.Description: Fired when a generic assert occurs.

Event.Name: StationCreated
Event.Description: Fired when a station is created.
Event.Format: Station was created.\nCurrently, this event isn't ever fired.

Event.Name: StationDeleted
Event.Description: Fired when a station is destroyed.
Event.Format: Station was deleted.\nCurrently, this event isn't ever fired.

Event.Name: StationChangesSides
Event.Description: Fired when a station changes sides.
Event.Format: Station changed sides.\nCurrently, this event isn't ever fired.

Event.Name: ShipChangesSectors
Event.Description: Fired when a ship changes sectors.
Event.Format: %.SubjectName% changed sectors to '%New Sector Name%' (%New Sector%) from '%Old Sector Name%' (%Old Sector%)

Event.Name: ShipKilled
Event.Description: Fired when a ship is killed.

Event.Name: ShipUsesRipcord
Event.Description: Fired when a ship uses a ripcord.

Event.Name: Initialize
Event.Description: Fired when Allsrv is initializing.

Event.Name: Terminate
Event.Description: Fired when Allsrv is shutting down.

Event.Name: BadFtpPath
Event.Description: Fired when unable to access ftp path.
Event.Format: Invalid or missing ftp path.\nPath = '%Path%'\nRun SrvConfig or check FTP server.

Event.Name: PlayerDropped
Event.Description: Fired when a player is dropped unexpectedly.

Event.Name: SessionLost
Event.Description: Fired when DirectPlay session is lost.

Event.Name: MsgFromUnknownPlayer
Event.Description: Fired when message received from unknown player.

Event.Name: IncreaseTokensMax
Event.Description: Fired when internal constant cTokensMax needs to be increased.
Event.Format: Allegiance: cTokensMax needs to be increased.

Event.Name: InvalidZoneTicket
Event.Description: Fired when an invalid zone ticket received!
Event.Format: Allegiance: Hacker alert! Invalid zone ticket received!

Event.Name: DecryptTicketFailed
Event.Description: Fired when DecryptTicket fails.
Event.Format: DecryptTicket failed for an unexpected reason. Report to dev team immediately.

Event.Name: NoTicket
Event.Description: Fired when login attempted with no ticket and no character name.
Event.Format: Login attempted with no ticket and no character name.

Event.Name: LoginFailed
Event.Description: Fired when database error is preventing access to the character info.
Event.Format: Database error is preventing access to the character info.

Event.Name: CreateCharFailed
Event.Description: Fired when character could not be created in the database.
Event.Format: Character could not be created in the database.

Event.Name: BadClientVersion
Event.Description: Fired when client tried to login with bad version.
Event.Format: Client tried to login with bad version.\nServer version = '%ServerVer%'\nClient version = '%ClientVer%'

Event.Name: MessageBox
Event.Description: Fired when generic message box function called from within the game server.

Event.Name: MoneyError
Event.Description: Fired when player donated towards something, and now has negative money.
Event.Format:
Player donated towards something, and now has negative money.
Player = '%PlayerName%'
Amount given = '%MoneyGiven%'
New balance = '%MoneyLeft%'

Event.Name: Connecting
Event.Description: Fired when game server prepares to connect to lobby.

Event.Name: ConnectError
Event.Description: Fired when game server fails to connect to lobby.
Event.Format: Game server failed to connect to lobby.

Event.Name: NoLobby
Event.Description: Fired when there is no lobby server specified on the game server.
Event.Format: No lobby server specified. Run SrvConfig.\nOnly lobby mode is currently supported.

Event.Name: HostSession
Event.Description: Fired when game server is preparing session for clients.

Event.Name: CantHostSession
Event.Description: Fired when game server cannot host session.
Event.Format: Cannot host session. Check for correct dplay installation.

Event.Name: CantWatchArt
Event.Description: Fired when registry Key for FTP/HTTP auto-update is invalid or missing.
Event.Format: Registry Key for FTP auto-update is invalid or missing.\nAutoUpdate may be disabled.

Event.Name: StartingService
Event.Description: Fired when game server is starting as an NT service.
Event.Format: Game server starting as an NT service.

Event.Name: ZoneAuthServer
Event.Description: Fired when game server fails to load zoneauth.dll and/or authauthdecrypt.dll.
Event.Format: Game server failed to load zoneauth.dll and/or authauthdecrypt.dll. Verify that they are both registered.

Event.Name: Assert
Event.Description: Fired when a generic assert occurs in the game server.

Event.Name: ArtChangedInInit
Event.Description: Fired when art changes during initialization.
Event.Format: Art Directory's contents changed during AllSrv's initialization.\nPlease restart the server.

Event.Name: SystemError
Event.Description: Fired when a service-related system error occurs.

Event.Name: LostLobby
Event.Description: Fired when the game server loses its connection to the lobby server.

Event.Name: GameStarted
Event.Description: Fired when a game is started.

Event.Name: GameEnded
Event.Description: Fired when a game is ended on the game server.

Event.Name: GameOver
Event.Description: Fired when a game has been completed on the game server.
Event.Format: Game over (but mission still active until all players out).

Event.Name: LatencyExceeded
Event.Description: Fired when the update latency on the game server exceeds thresholds.

Event.Name: ConnectedLobby
Event.Description: Fired when game server successfully connects to a lobby.

Event.Name: DisconnectingLobby
Event.Description: Fired when game server prepares to disconnect from a lobby.

Event.Name: DisconnectedLobby
Event.Description: Fired when game server successfully disconnects from a lobby.

Event.Name: DatabaseErrorSQL
Event.Description: Fired when there's a SQL database error

Event.Name: Pause
Event.Description: Fired when the server is paused

Event.Name: Continue
Event.Description: Fired when server is continued (from being paused)

Event.Name: DatabaseErrorOLEDB
Event.Description: Fired when there's an OLE DB specific database error

Event.Name: ServerShutdown
Event.Description: Fired when the server is shut down.

Event.Name: NewSession
Event.Description: Fired when an Allegiance Admin Object Model client application creates a session.

Event.Name: LoginServer
Event.Description: Fired when a user logs in to the server.

Event.Name: LogoutServer
Event.Description: Fired when a user logs off from the server.

Event.Name: ChatMessage
Event.Description: Fired when a chat is sent.

Event.Name: AdminPage
Event.Description: Fired when a chat is directed to an administrator.

Event.Name: AdminChat
Event.Description: Fired when an administrator calls the AdminSession.SendAdminChat method.

Event.Name: GameCreated
Event.Description: Fired when a game is created.

Event.Name: GameDestroyed
Event.Description: Fired when a game was destroyed.

Event.Name: GameStateChange
Event.Description: Fired when a game's GameParameters property changes during the phase before the game starts.
Event.Format: The parameters of game (id=%.SubjectID% name='%.SubjectName%' were changed.

Event.Name: LoginGame
Event.Description: Fired when a user joins a game.

Event.Name: LogoutGame
Event.Description: Fired when a user quits a game.

Event.Name: JoinTeam
Event.Description: Fired when a user joins a team.

Event.Name: LeaveTeam
Event.Description: Fired when a user quits a team.

Event.Name: TeamInfoChange
Event.Description: Fired when information about a team changes.
Event.Format: Team '%.SubjectName%' (%.SubjectID%) in game '%.GameName%' (%.GameID%) changed.\nNew team name = '%NewTeamName%'

Event.Name: HackLog
Event.Description: Fired when a possible hack attempt has occurred but the player does not get booted.
Event.Format: Possible hack attempt made by %.SubjectName%. Player not booted from the server.\nLine: %Line%\nExpression: %Expr%

Event.Name: HackBoot
Event.Description: Fired when a possible hack attempt has occurred and the player gets booted.
Event.Format: Possible hack attempt made by %.SubjectName%. Player has been booted from the server.\nLine: %Line%\nExpression: %Expr%

Event.Name: HackBootNoPlayer
Event.Description: Fired when a possible hack attempt has occurred and the player is not known.
Event.Format: Possible hack attempt made by an unknown player. Connection has been disconnected.\nLine: %Line%\nExpression: %Expr%

Event.Name: ConnectFailed
Event.Description: Fired when a Pig fails to connect to the lobby server.
Event.Format: Failed to connect to the lobby server: %LobbyServer%.\nCharacter Name='%.SubjectName%'

Event.Name: LogonDenied
Event.Description: Fired when a lobby server rejects a logon attempt.
Event.Format: The lobby server rejected the logon attempt: %LobbyServer%\n%Reason%\nCharacter Name='%.SubjectName%'

Event.Name: ZoneAuthFailed
Event.Description: Fired when Zone Club authentication fails.

Event.Name: ShipAngleThreshold
Event.Description: Fired when a ship's angle change is greater than one of the current thresholds.

Event.Name: ShipDistanceThreshold
Event.Description: Fired when a ship's distance change is greater than one of the current thresholds.

Event.Name: ShipsUpdateLatencyThreshold
Event.Description: Fired when the difference between a heavy ship update message's time and the current time is greater than one of the current thresholds.

EventGroup.Name: AutoUpdate
EventGroup.Description: Events related to the automatic update of artwork and data files.

Event.Name: AutoUpdateSucceeded
Event.Description: Fired when an automatic update process has succeeded.

Event.Name: AutoUpdateRestart
Event.Description: Fired when an automatic update process indicates that it needs to restart, which is not currently supported in PigSrv.
Event.Format: Auto Update indicated that it needs to restart, which is not currently supported in PigSrv.

Event.Name: AutoUpdateError
Event.Description: Fired when an automatic update process encounters an error.

EventGroup.Name: StateChange
EventGroup.Description: Fired when a Pig's state changes.

Event.Name: StateChange_NonExistant
Event.Description: Fired when a Pig's state changes to NonExistant.

Event.Name: StateChange_LoggingOn
Event.Description: Fired when a Pig's state changes to LoggingOn.

Event.Name: StateChange_LoggingOff
Event.Description: Fired when a Pig's state changes to LoggingOff.

Event.Name: StateChange_MissionList
Event.Description: Fired when a Pig's state changes to MissionList.

Event.Name: StateChange_CreatingMission
Event.Description: Fired when a Pig's state changes to CreatingMission.

Event.Name: StateChange_JoiningMission
Event.Description: Fired when a Pig's state changes to JoiningMission.

Event.Name: StateChange_QuittingMission
Event.Description: Fired when a Pig's state changes to QuittingMission.

Event.Name: StateChange_TeamList
Event.Description: Fired when a Pig's state changes to TeamList.

Event.Name: StateChange_JoiningTeam
Event.Description: Fired when a Pig's state changes to JoiningTeam.

Event.Name: StateChange_WaitingForMission
Event.Description: Fired when a Pig's state changes to WaitingForMission.

Event.Name: StateChange_Docked
Event.Description: Fired when a Pig's state changes to Docked.

Event.Name: StateChange_Launching
Event.Description: Fired when a Pig's state changes to Launching.

Event.Name: StateChange_Flying
Event.Description: Fired when a Pig's state changes to Flying.

Event.Name: StateChange_Terminated
Event.Description: Fired when a Pig's state changes to Terminated.

Event.Name: ScriptError
Event.Description: Fired when an unhandled error is encountered in a Piglet script.

Event.Name: Trace
Event.Description: Fired when a Piglet uses the Trace method.

Event.Name: ScriptsLoaded
Event.Description: Fired when piglets are loaded or reloaded.

Event.Name: ScriptBaseRecursive
Event.Description: Indicates that a piglet specified a base piglet that would cause infinite recursion.
Event.Format: %FileName%(%Line%,%Column%) : Base piglet '%BaseBehavior%' would cause infinite recursion.

Event.Name: ScriptBaseError
Event.Description: Indicates that a piglet specified a base piglet that contains errors.

Event.Name: ScriptBaseNonExistant
Event.Description: Indicates that a piglet specified a base piglet that does not exist.
